subject: [perl #42968] [TODO] Remove deprecated opcodes: adddoes, removedoes, singleton
body:
# New Ticket Created by  Bernhard Schmalhofer 
# Please include the string:  [perl #42968]
# in the subject line of all future correspondence about this issue. 
# 


In r18267, pre Parrot 0.4.11, Jonathan deprecated following opcodes:

  adddoes, removedoes, singleton

So with Parrot 0.4.12, after a deprecation cycle, the cleaning up can begin.
